title: File Content Popup
description: The File Content Popup provides a convenient way for users to view the content of a selected file within the application without leaving the current context. This feature enhances the usability of the file explorer by allowing quick file inspection.
acceptance_criteria: The File Content Popup opens when a file node is clicked in the File Tree component.
The File Content Popup displays the content of the selected file in a read-only format.
The File Content Popup includes a close button to dismiss the popup and return to the previous view.
The File Content Popup is designed to be responsive and adaptable to different screen sizes.
The File Content Popup uses a code editor for displaying code files, providing syntax highlighting and code formatting.
